Package gameplay.world

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Factory
    Credit to TA Dominique for telling me how to implement this black magic with meta classes.
    FactoryTest  
    LevelTest  
    World
    The world class acts as the game board, it manages interactions between gameactors and gameobject instances.
    WorldGenerator
    WorldGenerator's role is to take in a level configuration and generate a populated grid based on the given level specifications.
    WorldGeneratorTest  
    WorldTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Enum representing directions on the game board.
    Level
    Level enum specifying config information for the bomberman levels.
